price: 166. Laakiinse Alle wuxuu markhaati ka yahay waxa uu kuu soo dejiyey wuxuu ku soo dejiyey Cilmigiisa, malaa’igtuna57 waa ka markhaati kacaan (sidoo kale). Allena ku Filan Markhaati uu ahaado.
arabic: لَّٰكِنِ ٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ إِلَيۡكَۖ أَنزَلَهُۥ بِعِلۡمِهِۦۖ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَشۡهَدُونَۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
footnotes: 57. Malaa’igta Carshiga hareerahiisa ah sida Jabriil, Miikaa’iil iyo Israafiil.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lākini al-lahu yashhadu bimā anzala ilayka anzalahu biʿil'mihi wal-malāikatu yashhadūna wakafā bil-lahi shahīdan
